Package suncertify.gui

Class Summary
ApplicationLauncher This class is an implementation of the Façade pattern, hidding the various applications modes behind this ApplicationLauncher class.
ClientGui Class represents the window of the client application.
CommonGui This abstract class provides the implementation of common functionality between Gui classes.
ConfigOptions This class represents the user configuration options that are filled in the ConfigPanel of the user interface.
ConfigPanel This class is a common panel between the various user interfaces.
Controller This class handles all requests from the client user interface to the data model.
DBConnector The DBConnector is used in cases where the GUI client wants to make a connection to the data file.
RecordTableModel  
ServerGui This class represents the Gui window in which the user interacts when he launches the application in the server mode.
 

Enum Summary
ApplicationMode This enum specifies all possible applications modes.
 

Exception Summary
GuiException
